results.text:
You connected chat to your inbox.
From now on, any chats on your website will appear here. Choose what you'd like to do next:

Try it out 
Send a test chat from any page where the tracking code is installed: https://app.hubspot.com/live-messages-settings/22534293/inboxes/147959634/live-chat/edit/tracking?utm_tracking=chat_test_message_tracking

Manage your chatflow 
Manage your chat messaging and automation. Go to chatflow: https://app.hubspot.com/chatflows/22534293/edit/live-chat/7185125/build?utm_tracking=chat_test_message_chatflow

Customize your chat widget 
Customize the color and style of your chat widget. Go to settings: https://app.hubspot.com/live-messages-settings/22534293/inboxes/147959634/live-chat/edit?utm_tracking=chat_test_message_widget

Manage your team 
Manage team member access and availability. Go to settings: https://app.hubspot.com/live-messages-settings/22534293/team-management?utm_tracking=chat_test_message_team

Respond on the go with the HubSpot mobile app 
Download the app. Or learn more about conversations on mobile.
results.richText:
You connected chat to your inbox. 🎉
From now on, any chats on your website will appear here. Choose what you'd like to do next:

Try it out
Send a test chat from any page where the tracking code is installed. Get tracking code

Manage your chatflow
Manage your chat messaging and automation. Go to chatflow

Customize your chat widget
Customize the color and style of your chat widget. Go to settings

Manage your team
Manage team member access and availability. Go to settings

Respond on the go with the HubSpot mobile app
Download the app. Or learn more about conversations on mobile.

results.text: Got any questions? I'm happy to help.
